context: The player and the main antagonist meet for the first time in an ancient, crumbling ruin. The air is thick with tension and the smell of ozone.

characters.name: Arion
characters.personality: Determined and slightly naive, but has a strong sense of justice. Believes in second chances.
characters.relationship: Rival of Velara, unaware of her true power.

characters.name: Velara
characters.personality: Cold, calculating, and cynical. Views human emotions as a weakness. Has a hidden past.
characters.relationship: Former mentor to Arion, now his greatest rival.

characters.name: Kael
characters.personality: Observant and cautious. Loyal to Arion but wary of all magic.
characters.relationship: Arion's childhood friend and trusted companion.
